Html:
Array functions in the existing sheet modified to normal formulae after saving the excel sheet. i am using excel2007 reader and writer. i have seen some posts about this issue but i failed to find out a solution. Can anybody help me?
These are the formulae i used in my existing sheet.
 {=AVERAGE(IF(D4:D15>0;D4:D15))}
 {=MIN(IF(I4:I15>0;I4:I15))}
Array formulas are not supported in the current version (1.7.8) but Mark has been working hard to implement: patience... or help him to ensure that it is completed more quickly.
Ok. Thank you for your reply LWol
